snippet.title: Echoes of the Deep Preview - Gameplay Showcase #1
snippet.description:
Now has: player animations, level system, enemies, health, combat, level/ difficulty saving, data saving/ loading
─────────────────────────
Please don't expect anything advanced, this is my 1st game afterall!
─────────────────────────
The game will be publicly available and playable on April 5th.
─────────────────────────
View the game soundtracks here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgvrYxHtvvE2FUtKbXX9DtaBXCidoMumY
